"Time Traveler's Bag" - A luggage tag that incorporates a small time machine. The user can set the time and location they want to travel to, and the luggage tag will automatically transport them there.
" Tag" - A luggage tag that turns into an art project. The user can write or draw on the tag with a special pen that changes color based on the destination.
" Tag" - A luggage tag that turns into an interactive game. The user can scan the tag with their phone and play a game related to the destination.
" Tag" - A luggage tag that turns into a virtual reality experience. The user can scan the tag with their phone and enter a virtual reality world related to the destination.
" Tag" - A luggage tag that turns into a personalized story. The user can write a story on the tag and share it with others when they arrive at their destination.
